author: Barak Ravid
title: U.S. protests Israel's refusal to back UN resolution condemning Russia
description: 87 countries signed the resolution, but not Israel.
content: U.S. Ambassador to the UN Linda Thomas-Greenfield protested to her Israeli counterpart over Israel's refusal to join 87 countries in backing a U.S.-led resolution to condemn Russia's invasion of Ukraâ€¦ [+2174 chars]
